channel.title: github_trending
channel.description: Latest posts from https://github.com/trending. follow.is: None

item.title: Blaizzy /mlx-audio
item.description: A text-to-speech (TTS), speech-to-text (STT) and speech-to-speech (STS) library built on Apple's MLX framework, providing efficient speech analysis on Apple Silicon.

item.title: panaversity /learn-agentic-ai
item.description: Learn Agentic AI using Dapr Agentic Cloud Ascent (DACA) Design Pattern and Agent-Native Cloud Technologies: OpenAI Agents SDK, Memory, MCP, A2A, Knowledge Graphs, Dapr, Rancher Desktop, and Kubernetes.

item.title: Mail-0 /Zero
item.description: Experience email the way you want with 0 – the first open source email app that puts your privacy and safety first. Join the discord:https://discord.gg/0email

item.title: kamranahmedse /developer-roadmap
item.description: Interactive roadmaps, guides and other educational content to help developers grow in their careers.

item.title: zed-industries /zed
item.description: Code at the speed of thought – Zed is a high-performance, multiplayer code editor from the creators of Atom and Tree-sitter.

item.title: isledecomp /isle
item.description: A functionally complete decompilation of LEGO Island (1997)

item.description: UI components for building fantastic desktop application by using GPUI.
